alert.note: Alert for Dane; Jefferson; Rock (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:12PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rock, southeastern Dane and southwestern Jefferson Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 212 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stoughton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitewater, Stoughton, Fort Atkinson, Jefferson, Lake Mills, Edgerton, Cambridge, Lake Ripley, Lake Koshkonong, Albion, Utica, Rockdale, Busseyville, and Cooksville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39/90 between mile markers 147 and 163. Wisconsin Highway 26 between mile markers 13 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
